column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: ROOT_BAN
column.comment: Level 1 -BAN in the associated BAN hierarchy. BAN ID of the tree root

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Billing Account number

column.name: BILL_SEQ_NO
column.comment: Sequential invoice number in which the conversation or data transfer occurs.

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_NO
column.comment: Telephone Numner

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: CYCLE_CODE
column.comment: Code of the BAN billing cycle.

column.name: CYCLE_FREQ
column.comment: Cycle duration. Valid Values are: 1 - monthly, 2 - bi-monthly, 3 - quarterly.

column.name: STATUS_CODE
column.comment: Participant status

column.name: SUB_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: displaying the last date on which the Subscriber's status is changed.

column.name: INIT_ACTIVATION_DATE
column.comment: A mandatory attribute, displaying the date on which the Subscriber is activated.

column.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
column.comment: Identifies the participant's product type (e.g. GSM).

column.name: SUB_MARKET_CD
column.comment: Contains the sub-market to which the adjusted charge or message belongs.

column.name: PP_CODE
column.comment: Clear key for the participant's price plan.

column.name: SUB_SEQ_NO
column.comment: A subscriber sequence number, for external systems use. For direct customers it is unique for the BAN, for SP customers it is unique for the MAN. Needed for the interface to the Internet.

column.name: EU_TOT_INVOICE_AMT
column.comment: Total charges and credits of current month, in EURO.

column.name: EU_CURR_CHARGE_AMT
column.comment: The value of all monetary activities due to charges since the previous bill which had an immediate effect on the balance, in EURO.

column.name: EU_CURR_CREDIT_AMT
column.comment: The total (unbilled) amount of credits accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This affects only the Total Amount Due. It does not affect the previous balance amount.

column.name: EU_TOT_BILLED_CHG
column.comment: The value of all monetary activities due to charges since the previous bill which had an immediate effect on the balance, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BILLED_VAT
column.comment: The value of tax amount associated with immediate charges, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BILLED_ADJ
column.comment: The value of all monetary activities, in EURO, due to adjustments since the previous bill which had an immediate effect on the balance.

column.name: EU_TOT_ILD_TOLL
column.comment: The total  TOLL ILD charges amount for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_OTR_TOLL
column.comment: The total  TOLL charges amount in Euro for the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle except for TOLLILD. This amount includes all subscriber level TOLL charges and BAN level TOLL charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_ROAM_AMT
column.comment: The total  ROAMING charges amount for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_SPCL_NUM
column.comment: The total  SPECIAL NUMBER charges amount for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_ATTEMPT_AMT
column.comment: The total  ATTEMPT charges amount, in EURO, for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_FEATURE_AMT
column.comment: The total  FEATURE RELATED charges amount, in EURO,  for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_OC_AMT
column.comment: The total  OC charges amount, in EURO, for  the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This amount includes all subscriber level OC charges and BAN level OC charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_OC_VAT
column.comment: The total VAT amount for the one-time charges on BAN level, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_RC_AMT
column.comment: The total  RC charges amount, in EURO, for  the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This amount includes all subscriber level RC charges and BAN level RC charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_RC_VAT
column.comment: The total VAT amount for the recurring charges on BAN level, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_UC_AMT
column.comment: The total  UC charges amount, in EURO, for  the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This amount includes all subscriber level UC charges and BAN level UC charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_UC_VAT
column.comment: The total VAT amount for the usage charges on BAN level, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_CTN_RC_DISC
column.comment: The total  subscriber level RC discount amount for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_CTN_UC_DISC
column.comment: The total  subscriber level UC discount amount for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_TREE_RC_DISC
column.comment: The total  tree bundling discount amount for recurring charges to the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_TREE_UC_DISC
column.comment: The total  tree bundling discount amount for usage charges to the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_UTC_RC_AMT
column.comment: The total  RC UTC charges amount transferred from the subscriber during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_UTC_UC_AMT
column.comment: The total  UC UTC charges amount transferred from the subscriber during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_UTC_OC_AMT
column.comment: The total  OC UTC charges amount transferred from the subscriber during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: NUM_OF_CALLS
column.comment: Indication of the number of billed phone calls within a billing period.

column.name: NUM_OF_ATTEMPTS_CALLS
column.comment: The number of attempt calls for all subscribers types. For roaming calls and calls initiated in the D2-network.

column.name: NUM_OF_ROAMING_CALLS
column.comment: The  number of roaming calls for all subscribers types. (attempted and successful call)

column.name: BILL_CTN_HIST_IND
column.comment: A special indicator for Bill CTN History maintenance that indicates whether the record should be stay in bill CTN table or move to bill CTN History table.

column.name: TARRIF_OPTION
column.comment: TARIFF_OPTION aus KIAS2000

column.name: ORIGINAL_INIT_DATE
column.comment: Aktivierungsdatum

column.name: NDC
column.comment: National Destination Code (Die Vorwahl einer Telefonnummer)

column.name: VAS_SMS_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the feature is a VAS or SMS in order to count the number of charges.

column.name: IDENT_FOR_CUST
column.comment: An identifier of a subscriber that should appear on the subscriber bills.

column.name: EU_MP_AMT
column.comment: The total MobilePayment charges amount for the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: CURR_STAT_POINT
column.comment: The SiGoPla status of the subscriber. Values: R - Red, S - Silver, G - Gold, P - Platinum.

column.name: REWARDS_IND
column.comment: Indicates wheather the subscriber participates in the Rewards program. - Indicates whether the subscriber participates in the Rewards programm.

column.name: BL_CHG_ADVNC_IND
column.comment: Field indicates if the bill for the subscriber was calculated in advance by BLPREP.

column.name: BL_CHG_ELIG_LOSE_DT
column.comment: The date in the future when the subscriber loses its eligibility.

column.name: BL_CHG_ELIG_LOSE_CFR
column.comment: The sequence number of the CSM_FUTURE_REQUEST record which determines the eligibility loss.

column.name: BL_CHG_EXC_IND
column.comment: If set on 'Y', the subscriber is not eligible for basic fees in advance.

column.name: BL_CHG_ELIG_UPD_TIME
column.comment: Time when the eligibility fields of the subscriber have been latest updated

column.name: BL_CHG_ELIG_IND
column.comment: It indicates if subscriber is eligible or not.

column.name: MD5_ENCRYPT_ID
column.comment: Encryption for surrogate key

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
